R
add	000000	rs	rt	rd	00000	100000
addu	000000	rs	rt	rd	00000	100001
sub	000000	rs	rt	rd	00000	100010
subu	000000	rs	rt	rd	00000	100011
and	000000	rs	rt	rd	00000	100100
mult	000000	rs	rt	0000000000	011000
multu	000000	rs	rt	0000000000	011001
div	000000	rs	rt	0000000000	011010
divu	000000	rs	rt	0000000000	011011
mfhi	000000	0000000000	rd	00000	010000
mflo	000000	0000000000	rd	00000	010010
mthi	000000	rs	000000000000000	010001
mtlo	000000	rs	000000000000000	010011
mfc0	010000	00000	rt	rd	00000000	sel
mtc0	010000	00100	rt	rd	00000000	sel
or	000000	rs	rt	rd	00000	100101
xor	000000	rs	rt	rd	00000	100110
nor	000000	rs	rt	rd	00000	100111
slt	000000	rs	rt	rd	00000	101010
sltu	000000	rs	rt	rd	00000	101011
sll	000000	00000	rt	rd	shamt	000000
srl	000000	00000	rt	rd	shamt	000010
sra	000000	00000	rt	rd	shamt	000011
sllv	000000	rs	rt	rd	00000	000100
srlv	000000	rs	rt	rd	00000	000110
srav	000000	rs	rt	rd	00000	000111
jr	000000	rs	00000	00000	00000	001000
jalr	000000	rs	00000	rd	00000	001001
break	000000	code	001101
syscall	000000	code	001100
eret	000000	1000 0000 0000 0000 0000	011000
I
addi	001000	rs	rt	immediate
addiu	001001	rs	rt	immediate
andi	001100	rs	rt	immediate
ori	001101	rs	rt	immediate
xori	001110	rs	rt	immediate
lui	001111	00000	rt	immediate
lb	100000	rs	rt	offset
lbu	100100	rs	rt	offset
lh	100001	rs	rt	offset
lhu	100101	rs	rt	offset
sb	101000	rs	rt	offset
sh	101001	rs	rt	offset
lw	100011	rs	rt	offset
sw	101011	rs	rt	offset
beq	000100	rs	rt	offset
bne	000101	rs	rt	offset
bgez	000001	rs	00001	offset
bgtz	000111	rs	00000	offset
blez	000110	rs	00000	offset
bltz	000001	rs	00000	offset
bgezal	000001	rs	10001	offset
bltzal	000001	rs	10000	offset
slti	001010	rs	rt	immediate
sltiu	001011	rs	rt	immediate
J
j	000010	address
jal	000011	address
